text: The Maison du Boulanger in Agadez, Niger, is a historic traditional bakery located in the old town, which is part of the UNESCO World Heritage Site. The building is notable for its mud-brick architecture and internal courtyard, offering a glimpse into daily life and craftsmanship in historic Agadez. It has even been used as a backdrop in the film "The Sheltering Sky".
title: Maison du Boulanger
